section.para: The ngx_http_access_module module allows to limit access based on client IP addresses.

section.name: Example Configuration
section.para: The rules are checked in sequence until the first match is found. In this example, an access is allowed only for networks 10.1.1.0/16 and 192.168.1.0/24 excluding the address 192.168.1.1. In case of a lot of rules, the use of the ngx_http_geo_module module variables is preferable.

directive.name: allow
directive.para: Allows access for the specified network or address.

directive.name: deny
directive.para: Denies access for the specified network or address.
